title: Bug 4329 - No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329 - No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: No search results are displayed when using the search function via the Package view selection and dialog.
EB: When searching for declarations, the search function should yield results. Specifically, searching via the context menu in the packages view should work properly.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the package view.
2. Select a specific package.
3. Use the search function within the dialog window to search for a declaration.
4. Observe no search results displayed.
5. Alternatively, search using the context menu in the packages view and note the difference in search results.
